author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
There has been a lawsuit between the Software Freedom Conservancy and Vizio for quite a few years now and following a partial ruling Linus Torvalds was not very happy with the direction that things seem to be going.

title: Linus Torvalds Is Not Happy With SFC vs Vizio Lawsuit
